channel.title: Institutional Influence on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Institutional Influence on FinanClub

item.title: S
item.description: score:114 Chances: SentinelOne (S) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects. Shares of SentinelOne (S) jumped 5.2% in the morning session after BTIG analyst Gray Powell upgraded the stock’s rating from Neutral to Buy and assigned a price target of $30.

item.title: CNM
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Core & Main, Inc. has seen substantial growth in its share price, with over a 100% increase this year. The company has announced multiple acquisitions and agreements to expand its product offerings and market reach. Institutions have substantial holdings in Core & Main, indicating significant influence over the company’s direction and performance.
